body.name: QimCoor Nursery Book Shelves Set of 4+1, 16.5inch Floating Wall Bookshelf for Kids Room, Natural Solid Wood Book Shelf for Baby Nursery Room, Wall Shelves for Bedroom Decor, Toy Storage Shelves

features: 【Set Of 4+1 Wall Bookshelf For Kids】The QimCoor nursery bookshelf fits a variety of decor styles and transforms any room wall into an efficient storage and display space. There are 4 shelves in one set, you can use them in different situations according to your needs. And we added an extra layer of wood to provide more additional storage space. You can use them however you want: staggered, neatly hung on the wall, or scattered in different rooms.

【High Quality Solid Wood, Strong And Reliable】These floating bookshelves for nursery are made of high-quality pine wood, which makes them strong and reliable.You won't have to worry about them falling apart or breaking any time soon. In fact, they can easily accommodate an entire row of books, toys, and stuffed animals!

【Protection Bar Design】The QimCoor nursery book shelves are the perfect addition to any baby or child's room. Not only are they durable, but they also have a protective bar in the middle to keep items safe: keep your child's favorite toys and books organized and within easy reach without worrying about them falling or causing injury. your little one stays safe.Perfect for organizing children's books, toys, small picture frames, other decorative items and more!

【Multifunctional Bookshelf】The design of the floating bookshelf is not only functional but also stylish. It can be used in a variety of ways, such as installed upside dow, making it a versatile addition to your child's room. The bars can also be used to hang clothes, towels, kitchen items and more.
【Easy Installation】Installation is a breeze with these kids wall bookshelf. They come with all the necessary hardware, making it easy to mount them securely to your wall in just a few simple steps.

【Best Gift】These QimCoor nursery book shelves are a must-have for any parent looking to organize their child's room. They are strong, sturdy, and reliable, and they will keep your child's toys, books, and stuffed animals organized and within easy reach. Plus, they add a stylish touch to any room, making them both practical and decorative. Suitable for bedrooms, living rooms, study rooms, kitchens, bathrooms, etc.Makes a great gift for friends and family who love to keep everything organized.

【Excellent After-sales Service】QimCoor store provides you with satisfactory service. No matter you have any questions about our products, you can contact us by mail, we will reply you within 24 hours. And give you a satisfactory answer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for our nursery! Super easy assembly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Easy to put together, looks so nice and simple.I stained mine because that’s the look I wanted. They are just untreated solid pine, so they stained great, and wild look great painted as well . I might need more in other rooms, they are a handy size and I could see them holding spices in the kitchen, or magazines above the toilet. Very cute!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value shelves for kids room
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for some small shelves for my toddlers room, where we could display a few books. These were exactly what I was looking for. It was easy to assemble (my toddler even participated) and they were up on the wall in no time. The cost is very reasonable; seeing as you get 4 in the package. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy assembled and look great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars May have to do additional wood work to make the pieces fit
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE the finish on this bookcase. It’s so beautiful. My only negative is that I have to do some carving to allow parts to fit together. So a chisel to remove some of the wood and a mallet to make sure the pieces fit together and are secure. I guess this is best to make sure it doesn’t fall apart. Just kinda wish I new ahead of time that I would need to do some additional steps to put these together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Build & Hold up well
reviews.reviewText: These are great quality. Reasonably priced too. I’m definitely no builder but had no problem getting these together. You’ll definitely need a hammer to get the pieces in.Says it’s suggested for nursery but I use it in my makeup area to hold my makeup palettes, and hair care products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and as advertised. Holds plenty of children’s books.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and unstable
reviews.reviewText: The holes did not align, so when you go to screw it in you have to make new holes. However, the wood is so cheap that it split the wood when making new holes. The bars also didn't fit well into the holes, leaving each shelf misaligned and crooked. Would not recommend.
